variantName: American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card

benefits.description: Complimentary domestic airport lounge access in India
Complimentary Priority Pass membership (lounge visits chargeable)
Hotel and travel redemptions through Platinum Travel Collection and partner hotels

milestones.declaredReward: 25,000 bonus Membership Rewards points and Taj Experiences E-Gift Card worth ₹10,000

declaredWelcomeBenefits.description: 10,000 Membership Rewards points on spending ₹15,000 within the first 90 days of cardmembership

declaredConstraints.description: Earn 1 Membership Rewards point for every ₹50 spent
Reward points are not earned on fuel, insurance, utilities, cash transactions, or EMI conversions at POS
Domestic lounge access limited to 2 complimentary visits per calendar quarter
Milestone structures and thresholds may be revised for new cardmembers; existing cardholders may retain current benefits on renewal

declaredEligibility.description: Applicant must be over 18 years of age and an Indian resident
Minimum personal annual income of ₹6,00,000 for salaried or self-employed individuals
Available only in select Indian cities as notified by American Express

sourceRef: American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card official page
